accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds is at least Zinc-400 or lighter.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all headings, code snippets, and metrics.
Use 'Manrope' for body text and UI labels.
Implement a 'Cyber-Minimalist' aesthetic: lots of black space, sharp borders, and neon accents.
For the Code Editor, use a custom Monaco theme that matches the #09090B background.
Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards. Use the custom 'review_card' style defined in components.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds and feature sections. Do not use placeholders.
The file extension for components should be .jsx or .js as per project structure.
Avoid gradients on text unless it's a very large hero title.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
